## Overview

Standardized bird transect surveys are conducted regularly in the Nature Discovery Garden to monitor avian diversity and abundance throughout the year.

## Objectives

- Monitor bird species diversity and abundance
- Track seasonal migration patterns
- Document breeding activity
- Assess habitat use by different species
